titles.title: Give me a sight, O Savior

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Give me a sight, O Savior, Of Thy wondrous love to me, Of the love that brought Thee down to earth, To die on Calvary.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Oh, make me understand it, Help me to take it in, What it meant to Thee, the Holy One, To bear away my sin.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Was it the nails, O Savior, That bound Thee to the tree? Nay, ’twas Thine everlasting love, Thy love for me, for me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh, wonder of all wonders, That through Thy death for me, My open sins, my secret sins, Can all forgiven be.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Then melt my heart, O Savior, Bend me, yea, break me down, Until I own Thee Conqueror, And Lord and Sov’reign crown.
